# Testing new splitting
```{r}
library(rsample)
library(tidyverse)
library(CAST)

data<-readRDS("DATA/training_data/training_data_1222020.rds")%>%
  drop_na()%>%
  mutate(class = case_when(
    class %in% c(7,2) ~ "Sage", #Sage and Black Sage 
    class %in% c(4,5) ~ "Other_veg", #Other_veg and other_shrub,
    class == 6 ~ "PJ", # PJ
    class == 1 ~ "BG_rock", # BG_rock
    class == 3 ~ "Grass" #Grass
  ),
  height = round(height, 1))




```
